name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: John Wick: Gunfights and Shadows Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immerse your browser in John Wick’s world of gunfights and shadows with dynamic visuals, shortcuts, and a sleek design.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dynamic Live Wallpaper: Relive John Wick’s epic battles with action-packed visuals.
Minimalist Design: Clean, user-friendly interface for smooth navigation.
Clock and Date: Stylish time and date display to keep you informed.
Quick Access Shortcuts: Instantly access your favorite websites.
Search Bar: Seamlessly browse with the integrated search tool.
More Extension: Unlock additional features to enhance your experience.
It searches using the search engine selected by the user.
